column5: Will be enough to stand aside. I go to Held!

column4: О! Ты принёс бинты, как я рад!
column5: You have well a rest? The grandmother calls you to us to the house. You after all want to eat as well as all people? And, Gekhend?
Yes, Claus. As well as all people.
What for vanity? Again someone died?

column4: Я буду помнить твоё доброе дело
Я помню как ты мне помог, когда я был ранен.
column5: You have well a rest? The grandmother calls you to us to the house. You after all want to eat as well as all people? And, Gekhend?
Yes, Claus. As well as all people.
